div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1556 Syria, northern, 1906 (475) Burial: c. 145-140 B.C. (Regling) Contents: 38 AR Alexander III: 6 late post. tetradr. (Tem- nus) Myrina: 12 tetradr. Cyme: 14 tetradr. Magnesia: 3 tetradr. Demetrius I: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Alexander I Bala: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Demetrius II: 1 tetradr. (Antiocheia, yr. 167) Disposition: Dupriez Dec. 12, 1906, 1-38 Tourneur, Gazette Num. de Bruxelles 1906-7, p.18 Blanchet, RN 1907, p. 111 Regling, ZfN 1928, p. 94-5 Thompson, NC 1962, p. 321 Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press) Published as the Haiffa hd. but actually from an uncertain location in North Syria
